name: 楊梵妤
objective:
人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
(EMI)  Interpersonal relationships involve understanding oneself and others, including character, attitude, charm, communication, pressure, setbacks, and emotions. It helps students communicate effectively with people of different tastes, beliefs, perspectives, and lifestyles. It encourages open expression of feelings and thoughts to establish cooperative relationships and develop personal potential for better opportunities.
